name: submgmmgm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: simprd(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cmgm), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
stmt.pretty: simprd(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), c2 ∈ Mgm, c0 ⊆(Base ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c2, cmgm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c2, cmgm)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)→ c2 ∈ Mgm)
⊣ (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)→(c0 ⊆(Base ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ Mgm))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c2, cmgm))), wcel(c1, cmgm))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1), (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)↔(c0 ⊆(Base ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ Mgm)), c1 ∈ Mgm)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c2, cmgm))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wcel(c1, cmgm))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cmgm), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c2, cmgm))))
body.pretty:

⊣ (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Mgm)
⊣ (c1 ∈ Mgm →(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)↔(c0 ⊆(Base ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ Mgm)))

body.origin:

-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c2, co(c1, cress, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c1 ∈ Mgm →(c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)↔(c0 ⊆(Base ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ Mgm)))
⊣ (Base ` c1)=(Base ` c1)
⊣ c2 =(c1[|`s]c0)

cumulated.origin:

-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))

comment: Submagmas are themselves magmas under the given operation. (Contributed by AV, 26-Feb-2020.)
